# Analyze Device, Greater (Spell)
## Overview
[[Clockwork Spells|Clockwork]] ([[Divination Spells|divination]])

**Level:** [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[2nd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 3rd-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 3]]

**Casting Time:** 1 hour

**Components:** V, S, F (a complete set of clockworkerâ€™s tools)

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** One touched object

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Deep Magic (Kobold Press), pg. 116

You discover all mechanical and magical properties, mechanisms, and functions of a single construct, clockwork device, mechanical trap, or magic item, including how to activate or deactivate those functions, if appropriate, and how many charges are left, if any.
